com.alee.managers.popup
Class WebPopup

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  com.alee.laf.panel.WebPanel
                      com.alee.managers.popup.WebPopup
All Implemented Interfaces:
FocusTracker, ShapeProvider, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
Direct Known Subclasses:
WebButtonPopup
public class WebPopup
extends WebPanel
implements FocusTracker

User: mgarin Date: 26.03.12 Time: 17:06

This is base popup class which offers basic popups functionality and contains all features needed to create great-looking popups within the window root pane bounds.

See Also:
Serialized Form
